description.value:
A Large Icon carried in one hand or affixed to a sturdy backpack. When held aloft any who are Dedicated to Khorne and can see it can add their Willpower Bonus to their Charge Moves, and gain an additional +10 to Weapon Skill Tests when making a Charge Action.

Requirements

Bearer must be Dedicated to Khorne for it to function. Heretical.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: -
